text: This is not an usual thing i'm used to do...
This makes me think if I'm doing the right thing...
This makes me think a lot, actually.
I don't know from where did you came
If you were looking for the same thing as I was
You made my heart to show some life again...
Your touch, your kindness, your attention, your listening and your eyes made me visible...
I don't know how much time it will last
But I really hope that it could last forever
I don't know what is exactly your conception of eternity, even if there is one, but I hope you to be by my side on it
Hope that we can day after day, improve our confidence and trust, if you allow us to
I want to know everything about you, I want to make you happy, to lay down on your arms and feel your touch, to share, to help, to be there for you whenever you need.
So, do you want to be my girlfriend? üíç
